original_text: And Moses said, We will go with our young and with our old, with our sons and with our daughters, with our flocks and with our herds will we go; for we must hold a feast unto the Lord.
korean_text: 모세가 이르되 우리가 여호와 앞에 절기를 지킬 것인즉 우리가 남녀 노소와 양과 소를 데리고 가겠나이다

sentences.original_text: We will go with our young and with our old
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 젊은이와 노인을 데리고 갈 것입니다

sentences.original_text: with our sons and with our daughters
with our flocks and with our herds will we go
for we must hold a feast unto the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 우리는 주님을 위해 축제를 열어야만 하기 때문입니다
